M J Dudak Woodturning

About
Work
Put image here

Hi! My name is Matthew Dudak and I am a hobbyist woodturner. I am still relatively new to woodturning, but am really enjoying the learning journey. I made this site just to show off some of my work, please enjoy! If you are interested in commissioning any work, you can email me woodturning at mjdudak dot com.
